parameters: Battle Start Process
Note: <type:battleStart>
Trigger: OK button
It is executed on SRPG_Battle Start just once.
If there are multiple pages, the top one is executed.
In addition to the initializing process for the plugin,
add events you want to be executed.
Eg. battle starting performance/conversations
For this demo, by using a self switch 'D',
an event which occurs just once a battle is created.
The self switch 'D' is initialized on the battle start.
// For demo
// Turn off the self switch 'D' of all the map events.
this.mapSelfSwitchesControl('D', 'off');
- Looking for Herb -
Victory Condition: Get 3 "Herbs".
Defeat Condition: All the friends are dead.
$gameSystem.clearSrpgWinLoseCondition();
$gameSystem.setSrpgWinCondition('- Get 3 "Herbs".');
$gameSystem.setSrpgLoseCondition('- All the friends are dead.');
People2
Maid
"I'd like to confirm a quest!
The quest is to get 3 "herbs" that grow in
this forest.
People2
It seems that there are monsters in this
forest at a level that ordinary adventurers
can't handle...be careful enough!
People2
The shiny things in the grass are "Herbs".
When you finish the action on it, you can
get it!
People2
And so, let's get ready for battle!"
Actor Turn Start Process
Note: <type:actorTurn>
Trigger: OK button
It's executed on the actor turn start.
If there are multiple pages, the top one is executed.
Can be used for events on actor turn start.
Eg. Displaying messages, changing BGM,
conversations on turn start, etc.
Region Events Processes (demo)
D
// The Switch 10 stores the value of the evaluation
//  whether there is any actor on Regions of ID 11.
this.checkRegionId(10, 11);
this.playerMoveToEvent(23);
Actor1
Adventurer
"Beware of Cockatrices!
If you defeat them...ugh"
D
Enemy Turn Start Process
Note: <type:enemyTurn>
Trigger: OK button
It's executed on the enemy turn start.
If there are multiple pages, the top one is executed.
Can be used for events on enemy turn start.
Eg. Displaying messages, changing BGM,
conversations on turn start, etc.
Turn End Process
Note: <type:turnEnd>
Trigger: OK button
It's executed on the end of all the actors' and enemies' action.
If there are multiple pages, the top one will be executed.
Since it's executed after turn has been incremented,
the turn count differs by 1.
Eg. if you want to execute an event after 5 turns
passed, execute it at turn "6".
Insert event commands you want to execute at the end of
the turns.
Eg. Performances or conversations at the end of the turn
Victory/defeat after a certain number of turns passed.
The turn count is stored to a variable (ID 3 by default).
Process Before Battle
Name: <type:beforeBattle>
Trigger: OK button
It's executed before the battle starts.
If there are multiple pages, the top one will be executed.
It's assumed to be used for conversations of actors or
enemies.
Process After Unit Action End
Name: <type:afterAction>
Trigger: OK button
It's executed when a unit finishes their action.
If there are multiple pages, the top one will be executed.
You can create events which is executed after a unit
(including both actors and enemies) finishes their turn.
Plus, it's also used for [victory/defeat judge].
If the conditions, such as a certain actor is dead or
all the enemies are dead, are met, you can terminate
the battle by executing the plugin command "SRPGBattle
End".
Boss Appearance Process
It checks if Cockatrices are dead. If all of the three
are dead, it makes the boss appear using enemy
reinforcements.
D
this.isUnitDead(10, 32);
this.isUnitDead(10, 33);
this.isUnitDead(10, 34);
this.playerMoveTo(13, 8);
this.addEnemy(29, 6);
this.addEnemy(35, 5);
this.addEnemy(36, 5);
D

What's the point of this battle?
People2
Maid
"Various events occur during the battle!
I hope you will experience that you can make
such events.
People2
The first is an event that is triggered when
you wait on it or end your turn on it. This
is used for "Herbs" and treasure chests.
People2
"The second is the region check. When an actor
comes on a specified region, the event is
executed.
People2
Third, reinforcement of the enemy. You can
easily make actors and enemies appear!
People2
You can also refer to other settings on
the editor to handle victory and defeat
and to set up the behavior patterns of the
enemy."
I want to withdraw

This is an event to be an actor unit.
If you input <type:actor> to a Note of an event,
it will be an actor unit.
Specify an Actor ID by <id:X>.
It will be the actor whose Actor ID is X.
(In this case, their participation and placement is fixed
also in the battle preparation.)
If you specify 0 as a value of X, it will be the next actor
of the party members.

// If you turn on cursor auto-movement with
// SPRG_UX_cursor, the cursor will move after unit event
// activation. So, it prevents the cursor from moving by
// executing the player (cursor) move whose destination
// is the position of this event.
this.playerMoveToEvent(0);
